pop-corn-bucket.name: Pop-Corn Bucket
pop-corn-bucket.desc: Ah, Pop-corns. Can't get enough of em. You get 25 Renown every time your favorite team wins a game.

stadium-horn.name: Staduim Horn
stadium-horn.desc: Make some noise! Start a chant! We want a pitcher! Not a. . . well, you get the idea. Doubles the amount of renown you recieve.

soda-can.name: Soda Can
soda-can.desc: Sluurrrrp. How Refreshing! You get 12 Renown every time your favorite team Loses.
